channel.title: How do i make my own
channel.description: ok so ur all gona porbably laugh call me a lazy idiot and say all this geeky stuff but how do i make like my own server were i can use like ::teletobarrows wen i go on to my own none of the codes work. how can i ad dmonsters and codes ,i looked around the forums but i cant find anywere that tells you . please somebody answer i wana make my own ive had enough of everybody elses sayign error all the time :mad:

item.title: How do i make my own
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

“here add this in client.java above a other command function”

So basicly if you search in the client.java for noclip, dragon or command that do already excist, they will look like

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“dragonchain”))
{

additem = 3140 // adds dragon chain
}

So find something LIKE that and put it above it:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("teletobarrows"))
           {

teleportToX = 0000; // x coord here
teleportToY = 0000; // y coord here

}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("dragonchain"))
           {

additem = 3140 // adds dragon chain
}

Got it?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make my own
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

Ok, here add this in client.java above a other command function

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“teletobarrows”))
{

teleportToX = 0000; // x coord here
teleportToY = 0000; // y coord here

}
[/code]

You have to find out the coords yourself, but this is easy

Read full topic
